snippet: Venezuela’s acting president, Nicolás Maduro, said it was unlikely that Hugo Chávez would be embalmed for permanent viewing because the decision to do so was made too late.
abstract: Venezuela's acting president Nicolas Maduro says it is unlikely that Hugo Chavez will be embalmed for permanent viewing because decision to do so was made too long after body began to decompose.
lead_paragraph: Venezuela’s acting president, Nicolás Maduro, said it was unlikely that Hugo Chávez would be embalmed for permanent viewing because the decision to do so was made too late.
